channel.title: The Big Finish Podcast
channel.itunes:keywords: Doctor Who Podcast, Doctor Who, dr who, Science Fiction, Dalek, Cybermen, Torchwood, Sherlock Holmes, Terrahawks, The Avengers, The Prisoner, Survivors, The Omega Factor, Nick Briggs, Tom Baker, John Barrowman.
channel.itunes:author: Big Finish Productions
channel.itunes:summary: Join the Big Finish team on their regular adventures through time, space, Victorian London, Mars, the 1960s and Megacity One for witty banter (ahem), free stories, news, interviews and exclusive trailers. We are best known for our Doctor Who ranges of audio plays starring Tom Baker, Peter Davison, Colin Baker, Sylvester McCoy, Paul McGann, as well as a world of spin off adventures with Jago and Litefoot, UNIT, Captain Jack Harkness among others. We also produce a wide range of audio drama featuring the characters from Sherlock Holmes, Blake's 7, Dark Shadows, Terrahawks, The Avengers, The Prisoner, Survivors, The Omega Factor and more.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Big Finish produces brand new full-cast audio dramas of classic TV shows, comic books and novels. All our titles are officially licensed and are available to buy on CD and Download.

item.title: 2018-10-28 Sirens, Tony and Cassandra
item.description: Benji has returned! Together with Nick they present a slightly revamped podcast, delving into the audio world of Big Finish. Archive tease: Doctor Who: The Sirens of Time. Drama tease: Dark Shadows: Tony and Cassandra.
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: Doctor Who, Dark Shadows, Sylvester McCoy, Colin Baker, Peter Davison, Nicholas Briggs, Benji Clifford, audiobooks, audio drama, science fiction
item.itunes:subtitle: 2018-10-28 Sirens, Tony and Cassandra

item.title: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 235
item.description: Cult TV aficionado, comedian, actor and writer Toby Hadoke provides the latest of this series of free podcasts and downloads, as he travels up and down the country talking to those who've been a part of Doctor Who's first 55 years on TV...
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: Virginia Wetherell, Doctor Who, Virginia Bates, Ralph Bates, The Daleks, William Hartnell, Philip Bond, Bob Monkhouse, Michael Winner, Stanley Kubrick, A Clockwork Orange, Doctor Jekyll and Sister Hyde, Tom Baker, Will Bates, Daisy Bates
item.itunes:subtitle: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 235 - Virginia Wetherell

item.title: 2018-10-21 First and Seventh Doctors
item.description: Nick Briggs is joined by Jamie Anderson to guide you through all the latest from Big Finish’s world of audio drama. Behind-the-scenes: The Seventh Doctor stars in Doctor Who: The Quantum Possibility Engine. Drama tease: Maureen O’Brien and Peter Purves star in Doctor Who: The Early Adventures - An Ideal World.
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: Doctor Who, Eve Myles, Sylvester McCoy, Bonnie Langford, Sophie Aldred, Peter Purves, Maureen O'Brien, Nicholas Briggs, Jamie Anderson, Gerry Anderson, Thunderbirds, Terrahawks
item.itunes:subtitle: 2018-10-21 First and Seventh Doctors

item.title: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 234
item.description: Toby's back for another Who's Round, as he seeks out another person associated with 55 years of Doctor Who on TV and discusses their time on the show and their wider career...
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: Clinton Greyn, Doctor Who, State of Decay, Tom Baker, Fourth Doctor, The Two Doctors, Sixth Doctor, Colin Baker, Jacqueline Pearce, Trevor Nunn, Richard Martin, Virgin of the Secret Service, Stratford Johns, Richard Burton, Elizabeth Taylor, Raid on Romme
item.itunes:subtitle: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 234 - Clinton Greyn

item.title: 2018-10-14 10th Doctor, Donna and Torchwood
item.description: Nick and Benji welcome you once again to Big Finish’s world of audiobooks and audio drama. Guest stars: David Tennant and Catherine Tate . Drama Tease: Torchwood: God Among Us - Future Pain .
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: David Tennant, Catherine Tate, Doctor Who, Torchwood, John Barrowman, Tracy-Ann Oberman, Nicholas Briggs, Benji Clifford, audio drama, audiobooks
item.itunes:subtitle: 2018-10-14 10th Doctor, Donna and Torchwood

item.title: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 233
item.description: Toby's back and it's about time! Mr Hadoke returns with some more interviews as part of a rash 2013 challenge to speak to someone involved with every Doctor Who TV story! In the process he's built up a fascinating library of discussions about the creation of film and TV and how it's changed over the years...
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: David Graham, The Daleks, Doctor Who, The Gunfighters, City of Death, Peter Hawkins, Dalek Voices, William Hartnell, Tom Baker, Douglas Adams, Shane Rimmer, Thunderbirds, The Chase, Leonard Rossiter, Albert Einstein, Parker, Brains, Peppa Pig, Timeslip
item.itunes:subtitle: Toby Hadoke's Who's Round 233 - David Graham

item.title: 2018-10-07 Blind Terror and Big Finish Music
item.description: Nick and Benji get straight to the point in a bumper podcast, delivering all the essentials of Big Finish’s audio world at this very moment. Guest star Big Finish musicians Jamie Robertson and Howard Carter conclude their in-depth chats, with many musical interludes. Drama Tease: Blind Terror: Gods of Frost .
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: Doctor Who, Eve Myles, Music, Horror, Blind Terror, Big Finish Originals, The Master, Geoffrey Beevers, Big Finish Day, Nicholas Briggs, Benji Clifford
item.itunes:subtitle: 2018-10-07 Blind Terror and Big Finish Music

item.title: Cardiff Unknown - October 2018
item.description: Welcome to Cardiff Unknown - a podcast about the strange happenings in the Welsh Capital of the world. Each week Geoff and Neve bring you the spooky news from Cardiff, the city that the UK forgot.
item.dc:creator: Big Finish Productions
item.itunes:keywords: podcast,cardiff,spooky,mystery,aliens
item.itunes:subtitle: Cardiff Unknown - October 2018

item.title: 2018-09-09 Celebrating Jacqueline Pearce
item.description: Nick and Benji present a special edition, celebrating the rather wonderful Jacqueline Pearce, best known for her role as Servalan in Blake’s Seven, but also known to Big Finish listeners as Ollistra, the machiavellian Time War Time Lord. There are interview clips with Jacqueline throughout. Drama Tease: The Liberator Chronicles: Volume 5 - Three .

item.itunes:keywords: Jacqueline Pearce, Servalan, Blake's 7, Time War, Doctor Who, River Song, Alex Kingston, Tom Baker, Nicholas Briggs, Benji Clifford
